channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
How can i change the xp you get i u ATTACK??
And for Sir Pali, if u read this, i meant when u ATTACK.

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Ok, open up client.java, and search for

TotalExp = (double)

You should find something like this:

if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) { TotalExp = (double)(40*hitDiff); // the 40 is the exp you get per 1 damage TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(25*hitDiff); // Exp per 1 damage TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(30*hitDiff); // Exp per 1 hit TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(25*hitDiff); // Exp per 1 damage TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);

Change the 25,50, or whatever your rate currently is into your desired rate.

Note: This piece of code will be in client.java about 3 times. Once for PvP, once for PvN, and once for magic(i think, can’t remember).

Change them all to your desired rate.

Read full topic
